title: How is it even possible to feed as an ADC
body:
Like, I don't get it. You're one of the safest and easiest roles in the game and you do more damage than anyone is ready for, especially if you're Jinx. 

Your job is to right-click and move places while two-shotting people with your auto-attacks. 

It should be impossible to do poorly as an ADC.

Case in point, I don't play ADC ever:
http://puu.sh/jifga/4b6669a81e.jpg
